LanguageData.AT_PsychicUserAdjustRateDesc: Adjust the rate at which this device consumes aether.
LanguageData.AT_GeneratorMustBeUnroofed: Cannot function while under a roof.
LanguageData.AT_GeneratorCannotBeAdjacent: Cannot be placed adjacent to other accumulators.
LanguageData.AT_GeneratorTooClose: Cannot place there, too close to an existing accumulator.
LanguageData.AT_GeneratorToggleImbuementDesc: Toggle, whether pawns can directly imbue the runes with their psyfocus.
LanguageData.AT_GeneratorToggleMeditationDesc: Toggle, whether pawns are allowed to meditate at this device to power it.
LanguageData.AT_GeneratorToggleTransmissionDesc: Toggle, whether the device will push directly into the network. If disabled, this device will fill only itself, disregarding the network.
LanguageData.AT_StorageAutoFillDesc: Allows colonists to automatically refill this device with aether crystals.
LanguageData.AT_StorageFillMaxDesc: Sets the maximum level to which this device should be auto-filled.
LanguageData.AT_StorageFillMinDesc: Colonists will automatically fill this device below this charge level.
LanguageData.AT_StorageAutoEmptyDesc: Allows colonists to automatically retrieve aether crystals from this device.
LanguageData.AT_StorageEmptyMaxDesc: Colonists will automatically empty this device above this charge level.
LanguageData.AT_StorageEmptyMinDesc: Sets the minimum level to which this device should be auto-emptied.
LanguageData.AT_PsychicPylonEnabledDesc: This device has it's transmission runes enabled and can be linked to the pylon network. Click this to disable the runes.
LanguageData.AT_PsychicPylonDisabledDesc: This device has it's transmission runes disabled and cannot be linked to the pylon network. Click this to enable the runes.
LanguageData.AnimaTech.GUI.MeditationActiveSwitch_Des: Whether pawns will meditate to refuel this object.
LanguageData.AnimaTech.GUI.SetPsycastersToMeditation_: Set up pawns that will accumulate psyfocus in storage.
LanguageData.AnimaTech.GUI.ImbuementActiveSwitch_Desc: Whether pawns will put their excess psyfocus into this object.
